extractFactDictList.question: What is the most common reason for sleep?
extractFactDictList.sentence: One of the most common reasons is that it is a normal part of the sleep process.

extractFactDictList.question: How many types of sleep talking are there?
extractFactDictList.sentence: There are two main types of sleep talking: simple sleep talking and complex sleep talking.

extractFactDictList.question: Sleep-related eating disorder is one of the most common?
extractFactDictList.sentence: One of the most common is sleep-related eating disorder, which is characterized by eating while asleep.
